snippet: Forward Drew LeBlanc of St. Cloud State won the Hobey Baker Award, given to the nation’s top college hockey player.
abstract: St Cloud State men's hockey forward Drew LeBlanc wins Hobey Baker Award, given to nation’s top college hockey player.
lead_paragraph: Forward Drew LeBlanc of St. Cloud State won the Hobey Baker Award, given to the nation’s top college hockey player.

headline.seo: Drew LeBlanc of St. Cloud State Wins Hobey Baker Award
headline.main: St. Cloud State’s LeBlanc Wins Top College Hockey Player Award
